summary: A remesh of the Nightingale male and Female armor.
descriptionHtml:
Update    25.12.2011
==================================================================================
Nigtingale Wth Ebony Pauldron
==================================================================================
New Nightingale Armor With the Ebony Pauldrons.
Not use it with the other armor,

You Must use only one of the pauldron version of the armor.

Dont use together with  Nightingale armor with Pauldrons 2.0 

Use only the one mod.

A remesh of the Nightingale male and female  light body  and heavy body armor.

Install
Copy the data folder to your main Skyrim folder where the TESV.exe is
overwrite all files if ask you to.

It should work with all textures.
=====================================================================================
=====================================================================================
====================================================================================

NightingaleWithPauldronMaleFemaleFixed small body
========================================================

A remesh of the Nightingale male and female  light body  and heavy body armor.

Install
Copy the data folder to your main Skyrim folder where the TESV.exe is
overwrite all files if ask you to.

It should work with all textures.

Pictures with alternate textures are made with using textures
from the mod   Recolored Skull Nightingale Armor 

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1025

When you change textures and download retextures mods and want to keep the 
pauldrons, never change the  meshes files in data/meshes/armor/nightingale
just change the textures.
====================================================================================
Ol version 1.0
=======================================
Nightingale armor with Pauldrons 1.0
=====================================

A remesh of the Nightingale only male light body  and heavy body armor.

Install
Copy the data folder to your main Skyrim folder where the TESV.exe is
overwrite all files if ask you to.

It should work with all textures.

Pictures with alternate textures are made with using textures
from the mod   Recolored Skull Nightingale Armor 

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1025
author: Cokla
